episodes.title: The Slow Death of an Abusive Christian Cult (ICC/ICOC)
episodes.description:
The International Christian Church (ICC) or formerly, The International Church of Christ (ICOC) is a global Christian movement founded by Kip McKean. It emphasizes evangelism, discipleship, and a commitment to restoring New Testament Christianity with a belief that they are the one "true church".

This video aims to deliver a brief overview of their past, present and future and break down exploitative and cult-like behaviour within the organisation using multiple sources from former members throughout its decades of practice. To question the pyramid scheme, MLM level hierarchy of the organisation and calls for Christians to question if their faith in this church can really be considered "Christ-like".

I do not endorse bullying stalking or harassment of anyone shown in this video.
